EASTERN MEDITERRANEAN SEA.
DNC 09.
VESSEL, 32 PERSONS ON BOARD, DISABLED
AND ADRIFT IN VICINITY 34-14.00N 019-34.00E
AT 210720Z OCT. VESSELS IN VICINITY
REQUESTED TO KEEP A SHARP LOOKOUT,
ASSIST IF POSSIBLE.
REPORTS TO  JRCC LIBYA,
PHONE: 2189 1034 9739, 2182 1444 9149,
FAX: 2182 1360 6868,
E-MAIL: LMRCC.1@MOD.GOV.LY,
LMRCC.2@MOD.GOV.LY,
OR REPORTS TO MRCC ROME,
INMARSAT-C: 424744220,
PHONE: 3906 5908 4409, 390 6592 4145,
FAX: 390 6592 2737, 3906 5908 4793,
E-MAIL: ITMRCC@MIT.GOV.IT.
